interface.name: org.allseen.LSF.ControllerService.TransitionEffect
interface.description: This interface is provided by the LSF Controller Service to enable the LSF Controller Clients to create, update, delete, lookup and apply Transition Effects on Lamps.

method.name: GetAllTransitionEffectIDs
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to fetch all the Transition Effect IDs.

method.name: GetTransitionEffectName
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to fetch the name of a Transition Effect specified by the transitionEffectID.

method.name: SetTransitionEffectName
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to set the name of a Transition Effect specified by the transitionEffectID.

method.name: CreateTransitionEffect
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to create a Transition Effect.

method.name: UpdateTransitionEffect
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to update a Transition Effect.

method.name: DeleteTransitionEffect
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to delete a Transition Effect.

method.name: GetTransitionEffect
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to fetch a Transition Effect.

method.name: ApplyTransitionEffectOnLamps
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to apply a Transition Effect on a set of Lamps.

method.name: ApplyTransitionEffectOnLampGroups
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to apply a Transition Effect on a set of LampGroups.

signal.name: TransitionEffectsNameChanged
signal.description: The TransitionEffectsNameChanged signal is used to notify the list of the Transition Effect IDs whose names have changed.

signal.name: TransitionEffectsCreated
signal.description: The TransitionEffectsCreated signal is used to notify the list of the Transition Effect IDs that have been created.

signal.name: TransitionEffectsUpdated
signal.description: The TransitionEffectsUpdated signal is used to notify the list of the Transition Effect IDs that have been updated.

signal.name: TransitionEffectsDeleted
signal.description: The TransitionEffectsDeleted signal is used to notify the list of the Transition Effect IDs that have been deleted.
